page.title: 18Rose Queen.
page.content: It is now five weeks since I was chosen to be{ROSE QUEEN}for{St. Mary's {church.}As a{Rose Queen}I have a year to raise money for the{church}and {Sunday School}and then a year as the retiring queen. In six days I am to be{crowned.} There will be several speeches, including my own, in the ceremony. There is a stage for the Queens, and nearby are stalls selling food, drinks, and handicrafts. One money-raising event I have thought of is a{past queens}night which involves inviting as many ex-queens as we can. As there have been Rose Queens for many years we should be able to find a lot of them.
